SELECT a.* order by a.CREATE_TIME desc limit #{start, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{end, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.ID TRADE_ID, b.ID HOUSE_ID, d.ID BUILDING_ID, a.TITLE, a.TYPE, f.NAME DISTRICT_NAME, e.NAME TOWN_NAME, d.BUILDING_NAME, d.BUILDING_ADDRESS, d.BUILDING_YEAR, d.TYPE BUILDING_TYPE, c.FLOOR BUILDING_FLOOR, a.PRICE, b.CODE, b.ENCODE, b.AREA, b.ROOM, b.SALOON, b.TOILET, b.FLOOR, b.FACE, b.FITMENT, b.OWNER, a.RELEASE_TIME, g.USERNAME, g.PHONE FROM TRADE a JOIN HOUSE b ON a.HOUSE_ID = b.ID JOIN BUILDING_UNIT c ON b.BUILDING_UNIT_ID = c.ID JOIN BUILDING d ON c.BUILDING_ID = d.ID JOIN REGION e ON e.ID = d.TOWN_ID JOIN REGION f ON f.ID = e.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN USER g ON g.ID = a.USER_ID WHERE a.ID = #{tradeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT a.* FROM HOUSE a WHERE a.BUILDING_UNIT_ID = #{buildingUnitId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.CARD asc
